skill.description: Deals **280% Earth damage** to a single enemy, inflicts **Attack Down**. Gains **Counterattack** (2 turns)
skill.name: Heat Cut
skill.upgrade: **After strengthening:** Increase damage, inflicts 1 stack of **Bleeding**

effect.name: Bleeding
effect.description: 1500 damage per stack, debuff resist small down, max 10 stacks, last 70s

skill.description: **Consumes 40% own HP**. Grants all allies **Shield** and **Defense Up**
skill.name: Stirring

resonance.description: Deals **420% Earth damage** to a single enemy, inflicts 1 stack of **Bleeding**. Grants **Enmity** to all allies.
resonance.name: Abyssal Automation

effect.name: Bleeding
effect.description: 1500 damage per stack, debuff resist small down, max 10 stacks, last 70s

effect.name: Cover
effect.description: When allies attacked, become enemy's attack target instead (1 turn)

passive.description:
At the start of battle, gains **Revive**. Increase own **Hate**. When attacking enemies inflicted with **Bleeding**, increases **Enhanced Attack Rate**\
**Revive:** When taking lethal damage, revived with **30% max HP**
passive.name: Unforgettable Sin

passive.description: Increases own Water Defense. If HP is less than 50%, increases defense. If HP is less than 25%, further increases defense.
passive.name: Secret Obsession
passive.upgrade: **After strengthening:** If own HP is less than 50%, increase defense

passive.description: If HP is less than 40%, gains **Absorption** (1000, 3 turns) after using **Burst**.
passive.name: Synchronized Blessing
